name: Spider-Bo PC1
description:
Press Q to swing web

space to jump

WASD movment

Play as Spider-Bo

 After nearly 2 years behind the mask, Boyko Cosmo is a crime-fighting expert. Feel the full power of a kind of annoying Spider-Bo with weirdo combat, a ragdoll, jumps, and a small fighting area. A rookie still, this is the most weird yet normally weird Spider-Bo you’ve ever played. 

Experience a game 

The worlds of Boyko Cosmo and Spider-Bo don't collide in an weird, action-packed game. In this new Spider-Bo universe, iconic characters from Spider-Man’s life have been stolen because I couldn't come up with a different villain from Venom 

Broswald’s New York is not your playground 

The Big Apple comes to life as Broswald's most expansive and interactive world yet because this is the first game. Swing through the one small area and catch Venom and yourself. Use the your one weapon to defeat villains with epic takedowns in truly strange action. As you can see from those the game is not much though I might expand more on the game in the future so stay tuned 

**Note this is just a prototype and MAY be continued in the future**
